FINGERPRINTS

you left your fingerprints
all over my soul
I can't erase it
I don't want to
you left your fingerprints
deep in my heart

You changed me, dear
You seared my soul
You cant
take it back
my heart will always remember
your touch
I will always remember
the rush
Its gone now though
I wish for your touch.
